description:
This comprehensive list represents the largest companies in the United States by revenue as of 2022, meticulously compiled by the renowned Fortune 500 ranking. It encompasses publicly traded companies, including those engaged in tax inversion, as well as corporations with foundations in the United States, such as corporate headquarters, operational headquarters, and independent subsidiaries.

While this compilation focuses on publicly traded entities, it is important to note that there are also substantial privately held companies, such as Cargill and Koch Industries, whose financial data may not be publicly accessible. Nonetheless, this list does include several government-sponsored enterprises that originated from acts of Congress and later transitioned to becoming publicly traded.

These companies epitomize the scale and financial might of the American corporate landscape. They encompass diverse industries, ranging from technology and finance to manufacturing and healthcare. With their significant market presence, they not only drive economic growth but also shape global business trends.
title: Largest companies in the United States by revenue
